values.name: ParticipateDoNotInitiate
values.comment: Cancel if order would have executed on placement (i.e. not as maker)

values.name: CancelIfNotBest
values.comment: Cancel if order can not be placed at best price

values.name: DoNotIncrease
values.comment: Order may only reduce net position, order quantity can automatically be reduced by exchange

values.name: DoNotReduce
values.comment: Order can not be partially filled, aka. all-or-none (AON) orders
